name: rag-conversational-agent (enricollen)
description: [项目级] A simple local Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot that can answer to questions by acquiring information from personal PDF documents.。来源: https://github.com/enricollen/rag-conversational-agent

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A simple local Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot that can answer to questions by acquiring information from personal PDF documents.

来源: https://github.com/enricollen/rag-conversational-agent
语言: Python
Stars: 43

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
1. **Choose Your Setup**:
   - You have three different options for setting up the LLMs:
     1. Local setup using Ollama.
     2. Using the OpenAI API for GPT models.
     3. Using the Anthropic API for Claude models.

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
README.md
app.py
data
data/alpha_society.pdf
data/beta_society.pdf
data/gamma_society.pdf
embeddings
embeddings/embeddings.py
embeddings/openai_embeddings.py
llm
llm/llm.py
llm/llm_factory.py
populate_database.py
requirements.txt
retrieval
retrieval/rag_retriever.py
static
static/admin_settings.js
static/demo_img
static/styles.css
